---
title: "Historical Package Development"
---

This is a dashboard for the XXX repository, containing the following
three main pages:

1. [_Package stats_](./fn-stats.html) displaying statistics on the internal
   package structure, via a series of graphs tracing the development of
   the XXX repository over time.
2. [_Contributors_](./contributors.html) which traces individual contributions
   to the repository over time, along with numbers of issues and pull requests
   opened on GitHub.
3. [_Network_](network.html) showing an interactive network diagram of the
   ecosystem of developers of the XXX repository, and connections to
   other repositories to which these developers have contributed.
